unit.description: Unit that makes sense for the metric

category.description: Name of the metric category that the metric belongs to. A metric can only belong to a single category.

aggregationType.description: Only provide one value for this field. Valid values: Average, Minimum, Maximum, Total, Count.

fillGapWithZero.description: Optional. If set to true, then zero will be returned for time duration where no metric is emitted/published.

sourceMdmAccount.description: The name of the MDM account.

sourceMdmNamespace.description: The name of the MDM namespace.

MountOptionEnum.description: Mode that describes whether the LUN has to be mounted as a datastore or attached as a LUN

id.description: Azure resource ID of the NetApp volume

properties.description: The properties of a private cloud resource

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

sku.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) assigned to this resource.

principalId.description: The principal ID of private cloud identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID associated with the private cloud. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

networkBlock.description: The block of addresses should be unique across VNet in your subscription as well as on-premise. Make sure the CIDR format is conformed to (A.B.C.D/X) where A,B,C,D are between 0 and 255, and X is between 0 and 22

managementNetwork.description: Network used to access vCenter Server and NSX-T Manager

provisioningNetwork.description: Used for virtual machine cold migration, cloning, and snapshot migration

vmotionNetwork.description: Used for live migration of virtual machines

vcenterPassword.description: Optionally, set the vCenter admin password when the private cloud is created

nsxtPassword.description: Optionally, set the NSX-T Manager password when the private cloud is created

vcenterCertificateThumbprint.description: Thumbprint of the vCenter Server SSL certificate

nsxtCertificateThumbprint.description: Thumbprint of the NSX-T Manager SSL certificate

externalCloudLinks.description: Array of cloud link IDs from other clouds that connect to this one

secondaryCircuit.description: A secondary expressRoute circuit from a separate AZ. Only present in a stretched private cloud

nsxPublicIpQuotaRaised.description: Flag to indicate whether the private cloud has the quota for provisioned NSX Public IP count raised from 64 to 1024

properties.description: The updatable properties of a private cloud resource

identity.description: The identity of the private cloud, if configured.

managementCluster.description: The default cluster used for management

internet.description: Connectivity to internet is enabled or disabled

identitySources.description: vCenter Single Sign On Identity Sources

availability.description: Properties describing how the cloud is distributed across availability zones

encryption.description: Customer managed key encryption, can be enabled or disabled

extendedNetworkBlocks.description: Array of additional networks noncontiguous with networkBlock. Networks must be unique and non-overlapping across VNet in your subscription, on-premise, and this privateCloud networkBlock attribute. Make sure the CIDR format conforms to (A.B.C.D/X).
